title: Mexico Food Company Herdez Soars 12% on Earnings Beat, Outlook
description: Shares of Mexican food company Grupo Herdez are on track for their best day in six months following an earnings beat and amid an optimistic sales outlook.
content: Shares of Mexican food company Grupo Herdez are on track for their best day in six months following an earnings beat and amid an optimistic sales outlook.
